gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.util
Class ImageRecord

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.util.ImageRecord

public class ImageRecord
extends java.lang.Object

Image Record Metadata. Used to transfer image properties.

Author:
Ryan Chute
